subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Holding of First Karni Singh Rally in Rajasthan
question_en: When and where was the first Karni Singh Rally held in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में पहली कर्नी सिंग रायल कब और कहा गया था?
D_hi: आरपी घरतीयां, जयपुर के सांगानेरी विश्वासितां
explanation_en: The first Karni Singh Rally was held in Jaipur, at Albert Hall in March 1962.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान मंगाई, अल्बर हॉल, जयपुर की मुद्रा
explanation: राजस्थान मंगाई, अल्बर हॉल, जयपुर की मुद्रा
explanation_en: The first Karni Singh Rally was organized in Jaipur at Albert Hall in March 1962.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान मंगाई, अल्बर हॉल, जयपुर की मुद्रा

explanation_hi.subject: Rajasthan History
explanation_hi.topic: Raja Jai Singh II and his Significant Contributions
explanation_hi.question_en: Who is the famous Rajput ruler of Jaipur and what were his significant contributions?
explanation_hi.question_hi: जयपुर के अम्बर हाल के फोमेन और उनके अनुसंगीत सहित उनकी संतुलिखी मार्चकों और उनके अनुसंगीत
explanation_hi.A_en: Raja Jai Singh II and his significant contributions.
explanation_hi.A_hi: राजा जयपुर के मार्चकों और उनके अनुसंगीत
explanation_hi.explanation_en: Raja Kishan Singh played a significant role in setting up the first Rifle Range in India and was also a pioneer in the establishment of Jaipur Cantonment. His contributions are also known as Jaipur Cantonment's founding father.
explanation_hi.explanation_hi: राजा किशन सिंगे ने पहले भारत के पहले रेफॉर्स आई पहले बहले रेफारुसे पहले भारत
explanation_hi.explanation: Raja Kishan Singh played a crucial role in establishing the first rifle range in India and also contributed to the establishment of Jaipur Cantonment. He is regarded as the founding father of Jaipur Cantonment.
